actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Burdick without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 217.
Senate passed companion measure H.R. 436 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse at 316 North Robert Street, Saint Paul, Minnesota, as the "Warren E. Burger Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building and United States Courthouse located on North Robert Street, St. Paul, Minnesota, as the Warren E. Burger Federal Building and United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse at 316 North Robert Street, Saint Paul, Minnesota, as the "Warren E. Burger Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
